title: 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Fast Charging Lightning Cable iPhone Charger Cord Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7 Plus iPad AirPods
descriptions:
### 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger

**Product Overview:**
Stay connected with the 6Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger. This high-quality set of charging cables is designed to meet the needs of Apple users, ensuring fast charging, reliable data transfer, and seamless syncing for a wide range of devices. Each cable is certified by Apple, guaranteeing compatibility and performance.

**Key Features:**

- **Apple MFi Certified:** Guaranteed to meet Apple's high standards for performance and safety.
- **Compatibility:** Works with iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, iPad mini, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 4, and AirPods.
- **Cable Lengths:** Choose from a variety of lengths (3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) to suit your charging needs, whether at home, in the office, or on the go.
- **Color Options:** Available in a variety of colors to match your style.
- **Quality Copper Wire:** Ensures fast and efficient data transfer and charging.
- **Durability:** Reinforced joint designs and passed bending tests to withstand daily use.
- **Fast Charging:** Charges your devices quickly and safely.
- **Fast Data Transfer:** Supports high-speed data transfer and syncing.
- **Safety Features:** Built-in safety features to protect your devices.
- **1 Year Warranty:** Enjoy a 1-year worry-free refund and replacement guarantee.
- **Customer Support:** Get help within 24 hours for any issues.

**Package Contents:**
- 6 x Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger Cables (3/3/6/6/6/10 FT)

**Why Choose This Product?**
- **Reliability:** Trust the Apple MFi certification for a reliable and safe charging experience.
- **Versatility:** Multiple cable lengths and color options to fit your lifestyle.
- **Durability:** Built to last with reinforced joints and quality materials.
- **Customer Satisfaction:** Backed by a 1-year warranty and responsive customer support.

Upgrade your charging experience with the 6Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger. Order yours today and enjoy seamless, fast, and safe charging for all your Apple devices!
